message.content:
cs.NA, cs.IT, cs.SI, cs.SY, cs.MM

Reasoning: The paper deals with solving inverse source problems for physical fields governed by linear partial differential equations using sampling and approximation theory. This involves techniques from numerical analysis (cs.NA), information theory (cs.IT), signal processing (cs.SI), control systems (cs.SY), and multimedia (cs.MM) for processing sensor measurements and estimating the unknown field sources.
